text: Franz Schneider (born c. 1900s) was a German sprint canoeist from in Cologne, who competed in the 1930s. Schneider won three times the German title in the K-2 1000 metres event from 1931 to 1933 together with Paul Wevers, also from Cologne. Representing Germany, the duo won the gold medal at the in the F-2 event over 10 kilometres. ==References== Category:1900s births Category:Sportspeople from Cologne Category:Year of death missing Category:Canoeists
title: Franz Schneider
